publications.name: Graph-Conditional Flow Matching for Relational Data Generation
publications.summary: We propose a generative model for relational data that generates the content of a relational dataset given the graph formed by the foreign-key relationships by learning a deep generative model of the content of the whole relational database by flow matching.

publications.name: Zero-Shot Conditioning of Score-Based Diffusion Models by Neuro-Symbolic Constraints
publications.summary: We develop a method that, given a pre-trained unconditional score-based generative model, samples from the conditional distribution under arbitrary logical constraints, without requiring additional training, and is designed for approximating the true conditional distribution.

publications.name: Multi-Objective reward generalization: Improving performance of Deep Reinforcement Learning for selected applications in stock and cryptocurrency trading
publications.summary: We verify the reward generalization property of the proposed Multi-Objective algorithm on stock and cryptocurrency trading, and provides preliminary statistical evidence showing increased predictive stability over the corresponding Single-Objectives strategy.
